tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NP (PRP$ My) (ADJP (JJR better)) (NN half) (POS 's)) (NN sooooo)) (ADJP (RB far) (RB away)) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [sooooo/NN nmod:poss>[half/NN nmod:poss>My/PRP$ amod>better/JJR case>'s/POS] amod>[away/RB advmod>far/RB] punct>./.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (S (NP (PRP I)) (ADVP (RB only)) (VP (VBP have) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN shirt)) (PP (TO to) (NP (NN hug)))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [have/VBP nsubj>I/PRP advmod>only/RB dobj>[shirt/NN nmod:poss>his/PRP$] nmod:to>[hug/NN case>to/TO]]
